author: ianna
body:
#### PR description:

* Use production cut on proton set in XML files
* Use LogVerbatim instead of LogDebug
* Add a DD4hep geometry workflow test in a release validation test run automatically
 
Note: It needs https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/27299 to go in and updated payloads in DB.

#### PR validation:

title: Sim: Use Production Cut on Proton from XML Definition
